Hello.

My name is Nik Pawlak, and i am a Charlotte based designer. I create logos, websites, photography, graphics, illustrations, ads (print and web) and dabble in video. I'm a very visual person and I look at things a little different. I've been designing for over 7 years. I started a clothing company, Mindset back in 2003 and began freelanceing in January 2006. I have since developed a style that is clean and contemporary. Take a look around and feel free to contact me.
